      Determines if the dealer can hit (if their count is lower than 17 and the player has not busted) otherwise the dealer stands, and returns true Noah, Vik, and Joel

      void start()
      The start() method starts a game, determines if shoes need to be reshuffled, deals cards, handles betting, and takes options for players and dealers.
      void startDealing()
      Begins the game by alternating dealing to player and dealer (2 cards each) Noah, Vik, and Joel

        public void dealCard(java.lang.String dealTo)
        Deals a card to either the dealer or the player Noah, Vik, and Joel
        Parameters:

      • dealerOption

        public boolean dealerOption()
        Determines if the dealer can hit (if their count is lower than 17 and the player has not busted) otherwise the dealer stands, and returns true Noah, Vik, and Joel
        Returns:
        boolean

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        Determines if the player wins, the dealer wins, or push, and also handles chips including 3-2 payout from blackjack. The dealer then clears both hands and asks the player if they'd like to play again Noah, Vik, and Joel

      • handleInsurance

        public void handleInsurance(int i)
        If player recieves insurance, player gets back their insurance input Noah, Vik, and Joel

      • playerOption

        public boolean playerOption()
        Player option determines if a player hits, stands, or doubles down. Once a player has standed or doubled down, playerOption() returns true, but if a player hits, playerOption() returns false. If true, playerOption() doesn't run again, but if false, playerOption() runs again Noah, Vik, and Joel
        Returns:
        boolean the result of the playerOption()

      • start

        public void start()
        The start() method starts a game, determines if shoes need to be reshuffled, deals cards, handles betting, and takes options for players and dealers. When all player options are complete, the method sends the dealer to the endGame() method Noah, Vik, and Joel

      • startDealing

        public void startDealing()
        Begins the game by alternating dealing to player and dealer (2 cards each) Noah, Vik, and Joel
